data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Wyoming, United States.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wyoming, United States
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Wyoming, United States to the gospel today.

data.section_summary: On average, 42 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Wyoming, United States.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Wyoming, United States that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Wyoming to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Malay people.
Spirit, please defend the 153,209 believers in Wyoming against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Wyoming.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the state of Wyoming, United States has a population of 580,200.

We estimate Wyoming has 153,209 people who might know Jesus, 290,591 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 136,400 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Wyoming words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
